mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The building, ... had its Grand Hall (Großer Saal) constructed in 1392/1394. The former Talburg Gate (Talburgtor) of the first city wall serves as spire. The Old Town Hall was re-designed in late-gothic style by Jörg von Halsbach 1470–1480. After alterations of the facade during the Renaissance and again in the Baroque the building was restored in neo-gothic style 1861–1864. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Town_Hall,_Munich [work]
